txt.en: You have been tasked with defeating Frost-horde drake emissaries and destroying Angmarim coffers.
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Ausma for your reward!

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].

'My scouts have come back from the towers known as the Drearspire. Several drakes were sighted in the area, and the Angmarim were seen transporting several treasure-laden coffers.

'Climb the tower, defeat Frost-horde drake emissaries and destroy Angmarim coffers!'
Complete Mission: Stepping into the Drearspire

'Frost-horde drake emissaries have begun to claim the Drearspire as their own. Angmarim have also been seen with overflowing coffers following the arrival of these foul creatures.\n\n'Your mission is to defeat Frost-horde drake emissaries and destroy Angmarim coffers.'
Monsters in this mission will attempt to summon allies to the fight.
You have been tasked with defeating Frost-horde drake emissaries and destroying Angmarim coffers.\n\nSpeak to Ausma to travel to the Drearspire.
'Well done! With the drakes defeated and the coffers destroyed, the foundation has been laid for our work in Gundabad!'
